devdoc.details: All interaction counts are encrypted using FHEVM, only post authors can decrypt

params.countInputEuint32: The encrypted input value for incrementing comment count (should be 1)
params.parentCommentId: The ID of parent comment (0 for top-level)

params.postId: The ID of the post to like

params.tags: Array of tags for the post

returns._0: postId The ID of the newly created post
The encrypted total reaction count for the category

returns.author: The address of the comment author
returns.parentCommentId: The ID of parent comment (0 for top-level)
returns.timestamp: The timestamp when the comment was created

returns.author: The address of the post author
returns.timestamp: The timestamp when the post was created

userReactions.details: Tracks user's current reaction to each post. Default value is Like (0), so we use a separate mapping to track if user has reacted

devdoc.title: EncryptedLike - A decentralized social like system with fully encrypted interactions

ZamaProtocolUnsupported().notice: Returned if the Zama protocol is not supported on the current chain

CommentAdded(uint256,uint256,address,uin.notice: Event emitted when a comment is added

CommentLiked(uint256,address).notice: Event emitted when a comment is liked

PostCreated(uint256,address,string,strin.notice: Event emitted when a new post is created

ReactionChanged(uint256,address,uint8).notice: Event emitted when a reaction is added/changed to a post

ReactionRemoved(uint256,address).notice: Event emitted when a reaction is removed from a post

addComment(uint256,uint256,bytes32[],byt.notice: Add an encrypted comment to a post

addCommentLike(uint256,bytes32,bytes).notice: Add a like to a comment

addLike(uint256,bytes32,bytes).notice: Add an encrypted like to a post (legacy function)

addReaction(uint256,uint8,bytes32,bytes).notice: Add or change a reaction to a post

categoryReactionCounts(bytes32).notice: Mapping from category hash (keccak256(bytes(category))) to encrypted total reaction counts

comments(uint256).notice: Mapping from comment ID to Comment

getCommentContentChunk(uint256,uint256).notice: Get one encrypted content chunk for a comment

getCommentContentChunkCount(uint256).notice: Get number of encrypted content chunks for a comment

getCommentCount().notice: Get the total number of comments

getCommentCount(uint256).notice: Get the encrypted comment count for a post

getLikeCount(uint256).notice: Get the encrypted like count for a post (legacy function)

getPostCount().notice: Get the total number of posts

getReactionCount(uint256,uint8).notice: Get the encrypted reaction count for a post

getUserReaction(address,uint256).notice: Get user's reaction to a post

postAuthors(uint256).notice: Mapping from post ID to author address (for ACL permissions)

posts(uint256).notice: Mapping from post ID to Post

removeReaction(uint256,bytes32,bytes).notice: Remove a reaction from a post

userReactions(address,uint256).notice: Mapping from user address => post ID => reaction type

userdoc.notice: This contract allows users to create posts with reactions, comments, and categories
